channel.title: China on Allen's Whiteboard
channel.description: Recent content in China on Allen's Whiteboard

item.title: How I collected over 600k lines of prices in China
item.description: Hey there you are. I’m finally back here after over two months without posting anything. Was I being lazy? No, definitely not. It would be the busiest summer you’ve ever heard. I carried out several projects, some still in progress and the others finished in July and August. Start from today on, I’m gonna share you guys what I did this summer, in five or six posts I suppose. In
